answers.answer: I STARTED RECIEVING SSD LAST YEAR BUT APPLIED FOR IT JUNE 2005.. ITS A LONG PROCESS IF YOU DONT GET IT ON THE FIRST TRY.  BUT IM FROM OHIO AND I GUESS THERE ARE SO MANY PEOPLE APPLYING FOR IT THAT THEY ARE SO BACKED UP AND THATS WHY ITS TAKING LONGER TO GET A HEARING.  I TOLD THEM I HAD FIBRO.. CHRONIC PAIN..CONG. HEART FAILURE.. BLOOD CLOTTING... SWELLING.. DIABETES.. AND THE LIST GOES ON.. SO IT WAS A COMBINATION OF THINGS WITH ME AND I HAD TO FIGHT IT FOR A LONG TIME!  GOOD LUCK IN WHATEVER YOU DO, YOU'LL NEED IT WHEN IT COMES TO GETTING DISABILITY!  TAKE CARE!
Please check out our disability page. Here is the link to our health pages:http://www.medhelp.org/health_pages/list?cid=39

question: How possible is it to get approved for SSD with fibromyalgia? I have an appointment next week with the SS office in Jamestown, NY. I am from PA. Would like feedback from anybody from Pennsylvania that has been approved for SSD with this condition.
title: Getting SSD for Fibromyalgia
